20110101040135.000|20110101040138.000|CC1|>>> ORANGE COUNTY, CALIFORNIA IS
20110101040138.000|20110101040140.000|CC1|WELL KNOWN FOR ITS SUN-KISSED   
20110101040140.000|20110101040141.000|CC1|BEACHES AND FAMILY FRIENDLY     
20110101040141.000|20110101040146.000|CC1|TOURIST ATTRACTIONS.            
20110101040146.000|20110101040148.000|CC1|BUT SOMETIMES FANTASY GIVES WAY 
20110101040148.000|20110101040150.000|CC1|TO REALITY.                     
20110101040150.000|20110101040152.000|CC1|AND WHEN CRIME IS COMMITTED HERE
20110101040152.000|20110101040153.000|CC1|SUSPECTS WILL USUALLY FIND      
20110101040153.000|20110101040154.000|CC1|THEMSELVES BOOKED INTO THE      
20110101040154.000|20110101040156.000|CC1|ORANGE COUNTY JAIL.

20110101040201.000|20110101040205.000|CC1|ME.

20110101040215.000|20110101040216.000|CC1|POPULATION OF 2,800 MALE        
20110101040216.000|20110101040221.000|CC1|INMATES.

20110101040234.000|20110101040237.000|CC1|HAVE ANDY OF MAYBERRY.

20110101040244.000|20110101040249.000|CC1|LIKE SOME PEOPLE MIGHT THINK.   
20110101040249.000|20110101040250.000|CC1|WE HAVE SOME VERY SERIOUS FELONY
20110101040250.000|20110101040254.000|CC1|INMATES IN OUR CUSTODY.         
20110101040254.000|20110101040256.000|CC1|>> UNLIKE PRISON INMATES WHO    
20110101040256.000|20110101040258.000|CC1|HAVE ALL BEEN CONVICTED OF      
20110101040258.000|20110101040303.000|CC1|CRIMES, MOST JAIL INMATES HAVE  
20110101040303.000|20110101040304.000|CC1|ONLY BEEN ACCUSED AND ARE BEING 
20110101040304.000|20110101040306.000|CC1|HELD AWAITING TRIAL OR THE      
20110101040306.000|20110101040308.000|CC1|RESOLUTION OF THEIR CHARGES.

20110101040309.000|20110101040309.000|CC1|BREAK OUT IN JAIL JUST AS IT    
20110101040309.000|20110101040317.000|CC1|DOES IN PRISON.

20110101040454.000|20110101040457.000|CC1|GANG LIFE THROUGH HIS FAMILY,   
20110101040457.000|20110101040457.000|CC1|THROUGH HIS MOM AND SURROUNDING 
20110101040457.000|20110101040458.000|CC1|FAMILY MEMBERS.

20110101040710.000|20110101040713.000|CC1|HIS CELL SEARCHING HIS CELL FOR

20110101040717.000|20110101040720.000|CC1|>> SOMETIMES THEY WILL HIDE

20110101040730.000|20110101040731.000|CC1|READ IT.                        
20110101040731.000|20110101040732.000|CC1|>> DOES THIS HAPPEN A LOT?      
20110101040732.000|20110101040732.000|CC1|>> WHAT THIS?

20110101040809.000|20110101040810.000|CC1|IT'S CHILDISH.

20110101040832.000|20110101040833.000|CC1|AND ANOTHER INDIVIDUAL AND THAT 
20110101040833.000|20110101040833.000|CC1|WAS IT.

20110101040844.000|20110101040846.000|CC1|CONVICTION HAS BEEN FOR ARMED   
20110101040846.000|20110101040847.000|CC1|ROBBERY, HE LATER IMPLIED HE    
20110101040847.000|20110101040849.000|CC1|MIGHT HAVE GOTTEN AWAY WITH     
20110101040849.000|20110101040851.000|CC1|MURDER.                         
20110101040851.000|20110101040852.000|CC1|>> A LOT OF PEOPLE DON'T KNOW   
20110101040852.000|20110101040853.000|CC1|THIS BUT MURDER IS ONE OF THE   
20110101040853.000|20110101040854.000|CC1|EASIEST CRIMES YOU CAN GET AWAY 
20110101040854.000|20110101040854.000|CC1|WITH.                           
20110101040854.000|20110101040855.000|CC1|EASY.                           
20110101040855.000|20110101040855.000|CC1|YES.                            
20110101040855.000|20110101040856.000|CC1|IT IS.                          
20110101040856.000|20110101040859.000|CC1|WHAT GETS PEOPLE IN TROUBLE IS  
20110101040859.000|20110101040859.000|CC1|THEIR MOUTH.                    
20110101040859.000|20110101040900.000|CC1|THEY TELL ONE PERSON.           
20110101040900.000|20110101040903.000|CC1|ONE PERSON.
